definitions: relating to or comprising a set of three related people or things

examples.text: structures like this triadic group have been found in other early Mayan cities

shortDefinitions: relating to set of three related people or things

definitions: relating to or creating a chord of three musical notes consisting of a given note with the third and fifth above it

examples.text: triadic motives are associated with the music for the hunt

shortDefinitions: relating to chord of three musical notes
